---
name: Documentation request
about: Propose documentation updates or new docs
title: "[DOCS] "
labels: documentation
assignees: ''
---

**Summary**
One-line summary of the documentation change.

**Location**
Which file or area: README, evaluation docs, API reference, etc.

**Proposal**
What to add/change and why.

**Notes**
Links to related PRs, issues, or screenshots.
